title: Game Design Deep Dive: Controlling space and sound in Panoramical
text:
Game Design Deep Dive: Controlling space and sound in Panoramical

Panoramical developers Fernando Ramallo and David Kanaga take a deep dive into a simple question: How do you design and tune player input fo...
